body_html:
I also want to try Inception-V3 model to make a forward pass on images and extract features from intermediate layers. From where can I get the TensorFlow meta-graph file (i.e. classify_image_graph_def.pb)?
Also, does it contain pre-trained values for weights or biases or do I need to look for the corresponding checkpoint file (ckpt) in TensorFlow?
From where, if exists, can I get the corresponding pre-trained Inception-V3 model?
